Chicken Chimichurri Salad

Ingredients

  • 3 large chicken breasts
  • 1 red onion
  • 1 red bell pepper
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon salt
  • 1 teaspoon chili powder
  • 1 teaspoon pepper
  • 1 can cannellini beans
  • 1 can chickpeas
  • 0.5 cup mozzarella cheese
  • 0.25 cup balsamic or red wine vinegar
  • 1 cup olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon salt
  • 1 teaspoon chili powder
  • 3 tablespoons lemon juice

Cookware

  • 1 pressure cooker
  • 1 large mixing bowl
  • 1 large baking sheet

Steps

  1. preheat oven to 425 degrees

  2. cook large chicken breasts to pressure cooker on high for

  3. while the chicken is cooking, dice red onion and red bell pepper

  4. add peppers and onions to a large mixing bowl

  5. add olive oil to the vegetables, in addition to salt, chili powder, and pepper. Mix well

  6. spread the vegetable mixture on a large baking sheet and bake for or until lightly charred around the edges

  7. once everything is done cooking, add it all to the large mixing bowl again

  8. add cannellini beans and chickpeas and mozzarella cheese to the mixture

  9. mix balsamic or red wine vinegar, olive oil, salt, chili powder, lemon juice together in a small bowl

  10. add the spice and vinaigrette mixture to the large mixing bowl with everything else and mix well

  11. You can serve and eat immediately, but in my opinion it tastes even better if you let it sit, chill, and marinate in the fridge for an hour or so first
